dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare intrude upon our territory, puny mortal? What foolishness brings you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to parley, not to fight. We can coexist peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Ha! Weakling, you are lucky I find amusement in your pathetic attempts. Speak quickly, for my patience is short.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a tribute in exchange for safe passage through your lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A tribute? Interesting... very well, mortal. Leave it at my feet and be gone. I shall allow your passage this once.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Thank you for your generosity. I shall leave now as promised.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Begone, insignificant creature. Do not test my patience further. We shall meet again, remember this day.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be indebted to the likes of you. I'll find my own path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Prideful fool. You will regret this choice, mortal. Consider yourself warned.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense strength and wisdom in you. Will you not join me against a common enemy?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join you? Against our nature, against our kin? You jest, mortal. Your proposal is a mockery of our kind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your reluctance. Farewell, then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, fool. May the shadows of our realm consume you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall leave, respecting your decision. Perhaps we shall cross paths as allies in the future.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Do not hold your breath, mortal. Our paths diverge, and it is unlikely they shall converge again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I did not come to negotiate. Prepare for battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a spark of defiance. I shall enjoy crushing you like the insignificant bug you are.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear not your threats. Face me, beast!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance knows no bounds. Let our clash be swift and decisive.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a formidable foe in you. Let us test each other's strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, mortal. I accept your challenge. Know that defeat is inevitable for you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge of this land. Can you aid me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Seeking knowledge? Mortals are all the same... curious and foolish. What would you know?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I wish to learn about the history and secrets of this place. Will you be my guide?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Guide you? I am not your servant, mortal. The secrets of this land are not for your prying eyes.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your boundaries. I will seek knowledge elsewhere. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should, ignorant one. Leave before you disturb the balance of our realm further.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I shall depart. May our paths never cross again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May the shadows conceal your departure, fleeting presence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the inhabitants of this place. Will you share your knowledge with me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Ignorance is your true companion, mortal. I tire of this futile conversation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave you to your solitude, then. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Leave before my patience wanes further.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you prefer ignorance, so be it. I bid you farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your farewell falls upon indifferent ears. Depart, and trouble us no longer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough with riddles. Show me your power, beast!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impudent fool! You shall regret goading me into action.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I welcome your challenge. Let us see who stands victorious.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Victory is a fleeting dream for you, mortal. Prepare for your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no interest in beginning a conflict. I shall take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should, coward. Flee before my wrath consumes you.
